sentences.sContent: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.sCn: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.sContent: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.sCn: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.sContent: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.sCn: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.sContent: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.sCn: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.sContent: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.sCn: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

trans.tranOther: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
